text: Soni twalimbangenye wanganyao ni ichindu yanganitunâ€™dimbanganyichisya jenumanja (Makuraishi) ni yalakweyo (mpela machili ni chipanje), ni twapele mawiwi, meso ni mitima; nambo nganigakamuchisya mawiwi gao, namuno meso gao, namuno mitima jao chilichose pandema jawaliji nkukanila ma Aya ga Allah, ni yasyungwile wanganyao ayila yawaliji nkuitenda chipongwe
